content: How can I print the approval sign or check mark "✓" (Unicode U+2713) in Python?

To print the approval sign or check mark "✓" (Unicode U+2713) in Python, you can use the `print` function along with the Unicode escape sequence `\u2713`. Here's how you can do it:

```python
print("\u2713")
```

Alternatively, you can use the `chr()` function with the Unicode code point:

```python
print(chr(0x2713))
```

Both of these methods will output the check mark character "✓". Make sure your environment supports Unicode, which most modern environments do.
